title.rendered: Follow These Early Talent Award Winners on Handshake

content.rendered:
If you’ve seen the hype around Handshake’s first-ever Early Talent Awards, you’re probably wondering: what does it mean for me? You can learn more about the selection process for the 120 winning employers here, but to make it brief: these winners are considered some of the best places to launch your career. 

Based on our strict evaluation of four key categories, we know that these organizations go above and beyond to connect and engage with great candidates. Basically, they’re institutions where any college student or new grad should consider applying for jobs and internships! So, we’ve made it easy for you to do just that. 

Ahead, you’ll see all 120 Early Talent Award winners broken down by industry category. Simply click the link to navigate to each winner’s Handshake profile, where all you’ll need to do is hit the “follow” button at the top of their page (or preview card) to be notified when they post a job, attend an event at your school, and more! 

Why follow employers? 

Beyond getting notifications about companies’ listings and events, following employers you like will also help improve your job recommendations. These suggested opportunities become even more relevant as you follow more employers, so don’t be shy about following a lot from this list! Plus, when an employer views your profile, they can see that you follow them. Showing mutual interest in their organization could help you receive a message or virtual event invitation.

So get your “follow” finger ready and prepare to find some amazing new places to work. Enjoy! 

Accounting

  • PricewaterhouseCoopers (PwC)
  • Deloitte
  • Crowe LLP
  • RSM US LLP
  • KPMG LLP
  • CohnReznick LLP
  • EY LLP
  • Plante Moran
  • Wipfli
  • Baker Tilly

Architecture, Real Estate, & Construction

  • Black & Veatch
  • MAA
  • TRC Companies
  • Kiewit
  • Burns & McDonnell
  • Parsons
  • Granite
  • JLL
  • CBRE Group, Inc.
  • Turner Construction Company

Banking & Financial Services

  • Citi
  • Goldman Sachs
  • Vanguard
  • Deutsche Bank
  • Morgan Stanley
  • Equitable Advisors
  • Capital One
  • Prudential Financial
  • Jefferies, LLC
  • Mutual of Omaha

Insurance

  • GEICO
  • AFLAC
  • Travelers
  • Nationwide
  • Chubb
  • Lincoln Financial Group
  • State Farm Insurance Companies
  • Anthem, Inc.
  • Modern Woodmen of America
  • Liberty Mutual Insurance

Healthcare & Pharmaceuticals

  • McKesson Corporation
  • Pfizer, Inc.
  • Medtronic
  • Children’s Hospital of Philadelphia
  • CVS Health
  • Easterseals Southern California
  • UnitedHealth Group
  • Centene Corporation
  • Eli Lilly and Company
  • Philips

Manufacturing

  • Ford Motor Company
  • General Motors
  • Texas Instruments Inc.
  • KEYENCE Corporation of America
  • Amazon Robotics
  • GE
  • Collins Aerospace
  • Vertiv
  • GlobalFoundries
  • Tesla

Nonprofit, Education, & Public Sector

  • Uncommon Schools
  • Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC)
  • CDC Foundation
  • L3Harris Technologies
  • BAE Systems, Inc.
  • Partnership for Public Service
  • INROADS
  • Oak Ridge Associated Universities (ORAU)
  • General Dynamics Information Technology
  • Teach For America

Oil, Energy, & Gas

  • Pacific Northwest National Laboratory
  • Sandia National Laboratories
  • Clean Harbors
  • Chevron
  • Schlumberger
  • AVANGRID (BGC, CNG, CMP, NYSEG, RG&E, UI, SCG, NYSEG)
  • Phillips 66
  • National Grid
  • Shell Oil Company
  • Schneider Electric

Professional Services

  • ZS Associates
  • AlphaSights
  • CGI
  • Aon
  • McKinsey & Company
  • Boston Consulting Group
  • Aerotek
  • L.E.K. Consulting
  • Accenture
  • Mercer

Retail, CPG, & Food

  • Kohl’s Corporation
  • E. & J. Gallo Winery
  • Target
  • Schreiber Foods
  • Procter & Gamble (P&G)
  • Walmart Corporate
  • Under Armour
  • Gap, Inc.
  • Henkel
  • Follett Higher Education

Technology

  • Microsoft
  • Google, Inc.
  • Amazon
  • Apple
  • Viasat Inc
  • NXP Semiconductors
  • IBM
  • eBay
  • Fast Enterprises, LLC
  • Sage Intacct

Transportation & Logistics

  • Schneider
  • Enterprise Holdings
  • J.B. Hunt Transport
  • United Parcel Service (UPS)
  • DHL Supply Chain
  • Oregon Department of Transportation
  • Coyote Logistics
  • Norfolk Southern
  • Virginia Department Of Transportation
  • DHL Express
